title: Request for /muteall in the settings
body: so if you basically track the what players say in chat especially in bronze/silver/gold, it is over 90 percent negative.   very few good jobs or nice.   why not just give us the option?  it is about 100 lines of code.

replies.body:
100 lines to bind a checkbox? Are you writing on assembler?

Jeez.
hmm maybe less don't know.  Riot had said that their client was really inflexible.  They are slowly improving it.  Maybe it is simpler now.

i don't understand the problem

is "/muteall" too hard for you to type or what?

yes, multiple by 5000 games.  Yes.  Go head.  Start a timer.  Type it 5000 time in a text document.  No cut and paste.  Let me know when you are done.   Let me know how much you enjoyed wasting your life on it.

it literally takes less time to type it out than it takes for your champion to get from the fountain to the edge of the base.

do you have something relevant to do with your time within the first 20 seconds of the game other than wait for the minions to spawn?

Sounds good, but the problems are:

-its easy to just type "/muteall" 

-it gives you more freedom to do it so you have a chance to recognize your teammates attitudes

so.
yeah.
A check box is freedom.  On or off.  That is a checkbox.
Chat isn’t just positive va negative, it’s also used for shotcalling and strategy. Such a feature unfairly punished players that desire to use chat for strategy.
